data.trans: Có từ, bắt nguồn từ (thời gian)
data.trans_hint: Vấn đề của cô ấy bắt nguồn từ thời thơ ấu của cô ấy.
data.en_hint: Her problems date back to her childhood.
data.content_game_1: Her problems date back to her childhood.
data.answer_en_hint: Her problems date back to her childhood.

data.trans: Thư giãn, thoải mái, thả lỏng
data.trans_hint: Các em sẽ có thể thư giãn sau kì thi này.
data.en_hint: You will be able to wind down after this examination.
data.content_game_1: You will be able to wind down after this examination.
data.answer_en_hint: You will be able to wind down after this examination.

data.trans: Đi đây đó, đi lại, di chuyển
data.trans_hint: Những ngày này ông bà tôi thấy khó đi lại hơn.
data.en_hint: My grandparents are finding it harder to get around these days.
data.content_game_1: My grandparents are finding it harder to Get around these days.
data.answer_en_hint: My grandparents are finding it harder to Get around these days.

data.trans_hint: Một luật sư thông minh sẽ biết cách giải quyết điều khoản đó.
data.en_hint: A clever lawyer might find a way of getting around that clause.
data.content_game_1: A clever lawyer might find a way of Getting around that clause.
data.answer_en_hint: A clever lawyer might find a way of Getting around that clause.

data.trans_hint: Hãy quay lại trước đó hai phút. Chúng ta đã nói về vấn đề gì vậy?
data.en_hint: Let's go back for two minutes earlier. What were we talking about?
data.content_game_1: Let's go back for two minutes earlier. What were we talking about?
data.answer_en_hint: Let's go back for two minutes earlier. What were we talking about?

data.trans_hint: Chuyện gì đang xảy ra với con vậy?
data.content_game_1: What's going on with you?
data.answer_en_hint: What's going on with you?

data.trans: Thoát khỏi bộn bề (cuộc sống, công việc)
data.trans_hint: Hiện giờ cô ấy chỉ muốn đi đến nơi nào đó, giúp cô ấy thoát khỏi những bộn bề cuộc sống.
data.en_hint: She just wants to go to somewhere to help her get away from it all now.
data.content_game_1: She just wants to go to somewhere to help her get away from it all now.
data.answer_en_hint: She just wants to go to somewhere to help her get away from it all now.

data.trans: Đổi gió (làm gì đó mới mẻ)
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi muốn đổi gió, vậy nên chúng tôi quyết định đi du lịch Sing-ga-po vào hè này.
data.en_hint: We would like to make a change, so we have decided to travel to Singapore in this summer.
data.content_game_1: We would like to make a change, so we have decided to travel to Singapore in this summer.
data.answer_en_hint: We would like to make a change, so we have decided to travel to Singapore in this summer.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta bận ngập đầu dạo gần đây vì dự án sắp tới.
data.en_hint: He has been rushed off his feet as of late for the upcoming project.
data.content_game_1: He has been rushed off his feet as of late for the upcoming project.
data.answer_en_hint: He has been rushed off his feet as of late for the upcoming project.
